fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Set off bombs at your house, dealing an Overkill Rampage attack at yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Control, redirect, roleblock, etc immune. As in, you only use your ability when you choose to, and nothing can prevent you from using it.
- You ignore Astral and will still kill Astral visitors.
- If the game would end in a draw the day after you use your ability, the Town will win instead. This also applies if the only winners would have been non-NK Neutrals.
